div.div: Abby Kinney, Soccer and Track Southeastern student Abby Kinney (East Bridgewater), junior in Nurse Assisting and one of the 2020

div.a: Joshua Lovering, Nominee for CTE Presidential Scholarship
div.div: Southeastern student, Joshua Lovering (Brockton), senior in Video and Performing Arts, is among five in the state to be a
Congratulations to Jasmine Hamilton who was named as a Mayflower League All-Star for girls basketball! The senior captain averaged 15
Hi Everyone. Here is the latest statement from the MIAA office in Franklin. “March 14, 2020 To our MIAA Schools
Dear Southeastern Community: This message is to inform you that the Southeastern Regional School District will be closed from Monday,
From the MIAA Board of Directors: “The MIAA Board of Directors held a conference call this afternoon to discuss the

p.span: Southeastern offers a wide range of vocational and technical programs. These exciting programs give students a competitive advantage both in college and in the workforce. Our programs are designed to help students create and follow pathways to a career of their choice.

div.class: vc_separator wpb_content_element vc_separator_align_center vc_sep_width_60 vc_sep_pos_align_left vc_separator_no_text
wpb_video_widget wpb_content_element vc_clearfix vc_video-aspect-ratio-169 vc_video-el-width-100 vc_video-align-left
jl-acad-clu wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12 vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs
vc_row wpb_row vc_inner vc_row-fluid vc_row-o-equal-height vc_row-flex

p.span: Southeastern Regional offers a full and rigorous series of academic courses that range from introductory level courses up to and including Advanced Placement courses. Academics at a 21st-century vocational school are developed to ensure that students who take full advantage of our offerings have equal, if not greater, access to high-level courses that will give them a customized educational experience for a competitive advantage both in college and in the workforce.

a.class: vc_general vc_btn3 vc_btn3-size-lg vc_btn3-shape-square vc_btn3-style-outline vc_btn3-color-white

p.span: Southeastern offers many clubs and activities for our students. From traditional student council to our competitive robotics club, opportunities for enrichment are available to students across all programs both after school and through our extended school day option. Additionally, students may enroll in our international travel program that has traveled to places such as Paris, Morocco, Ireland, Spain, Portugal, and London in addition to domestic locations such as Washington D.C. and New York.

a.class: vc_general vc_btn3 vc_btn3-size-lg vc_btn3-shape-square vc_btn3-style-outline vc_btn3-color-white

div.class: jl-acad-clu wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12 vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md
vc_row wpb_row vc_inner vc_row-fluid vc_row-o-equal-height vc_row-flex

p.span: Southeastern Regional offers a full and rigorous series of academic classes. Class sizes are small which fosters critical thinking and exposure to honors-level content. Academics is a 21st century vocational school are developed to ensure that students who take full advantage of our offerings have equal, if not greater.

a.class: vc_general vc_btn3 vc_btn3-size-lg vc_btn3-shape-square vc_btn3-style-outline vc_btn3-color-white

p.span: Southeastern offers many Clubs & Activities for our students. From Student Council to traveling around the world, our students have built fun and interesting clubs & activities.

a.class: vc_general vc_btn3 vc_btn3-size-lg vc_btn3-shape-square vc_btn3-style-outline vc_btn3-color-white

span.em: Students have opportunities to participate in a full range of freshman, junior varsity, and varsity sports as well as intramural sports.

span.a: Visit our Athletics Facebook Page for more information

a.class: vc_general vc_btn3 vc_btn3-size-lg vc_btn3-shape-square vc_btn3-style-flat vc_btn3-color-blue

div.p:
Southeastern Regional Vocational
Technical High School

div.p: Governor Baker has extended his State of Emergency and declared that school buildings will remain closed for the remainder of the school year.

Southeastern will continue to provide distance learning to all students for the remainder of this year. We will be providing more guidance in regards to grades, attendance, and our plan to assist students that will require extra assistance to perform at grade level. In the near future, we will also provide information regarding how we will conduct our graduation ceremony. We feel that through this trying time, it is most important that our students remain connected with us. We are working on ways that our student clubs, activities, and sports programs can host virtual meetings with students.
In an effort to keep track of important information for parents and students, we have created a “Remote Learning” page on our website.

The Commissioner of Education asked us to please remind parents to complete the 2020 Census form as it impacts education funding. 2020 U.S. Census invitations have been sent to all residences, and families can respond Online in 13 languages.
